metadata.title: CVE-2023-49316 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In Math/BinaryField.php in phpseclib 3 before 3.0.34, excessively largedegrees can lead to a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-49316` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-phpseclib3 - 3.0.37-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-phpseclib3 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.37-1').
